entry: [$ismale] I thought I'd never see another dude anytime soon.
[not $ismale] I thought I'd never see a woman ever again.
Did you stone-skip-jump your way across the river as well?
stuck: At least I'm not stuck here alone anymore.
►What? Can't we just exit the cave?
The platforms on the way up are too high…
doublejump: I'm at a loss of words… can you help me get out?
end: Please let me be… I really hoped you could help me. !end @end
